name: Calm Waters
description: Nothing happens - there's nothing to "sea" here.

name: The Kraken
description: Sea beast ahead! The player must discard one Ration card.

name: Ocean Debris
description: The player draws one Game card and adds it to their hand.

name: Shark Bait
description: I guess it's every castaway for themselves. The player moves one of the sharks directly next to another player.

name: Freeloader
description: The player moves the player in the last place forward one space. If this is a tie, one tied player is selected to be moved. Then the player who drew this card draws a Game card.

name: Vortex
description: The player switches places with another player (excluding players in the raft).

name: Hurricane
description: Batten down the hatches! Every player discards one Game card and draws two more to replace it.

name: Island Calling
description: The player is lured towards the island by a mysterious sound and current, and moves backward one space, discarding the Ocean card of the space they move into.

name: Davy Jones' Locker
description: Yo ho ho! The players draws two Game cards.

name: Raft Drifts
description: Thank the oceans! The Raft card is moved one space closer to the players.

name: Rip Current
description: Go with the flow! The player who drew this card advances one space forward for free.

name: Feeding Frenzy
description: An extra shark is added on this card's space.
